title: ITC's Hotel Group signs two Storii properties in Rajasthan
description: Expected to open in early 2025, the company said Storii by ITC Hotels, Jaipur and Storii by ITC Hotels, Jawai, will exemplify the brandâ€™s ethos to offer immersive experiences. Including the recently announced signing of Storii Jaisalmer, Brand Storii will now have a total of three properties within the state of Rajasthan.
